title: Dad's leftover turkey pie
ingredients: ['300g frozen peas and carrots', '250g frozen green beans', '125g sliced celery', '150g butter', '100g chopped onion', '85g plain flour', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1/2 teaspoon celery seed', '1/2 teaspoon onion powder', '1/2 teaspoon Italian seasoning', '400ml chicken stock', '300ml milk', '550g cubed cooked turkey meat - light and dark meat mixed', '4 (23cm round pieces) unbaked shortcrust pastry']
